metadata.dc:author: Brenzina, A J
metadata.dc:description: A broad approach to evaluation, from different points of view is done. Goals, contents, methods and evaluation of a teaching activity are listed and treated. Characteristics of evaluation in each domain of knowledge are briefly explained. Opportunities of evaluation in different steps of a teaching sequence are pointed out. Several techniques of evaluation are listed and described. A positive attitude towards changes and improvements in evaluation of post-graduate courses is strongly encouraged.
metadata.dc:title: Introduccion a la evaluacion de cursos de postgrado.
[Introduction to evaluation of postgraduate courses].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de la Asociacion Odontologica Argentina
